    geojson() click to toggle source 
    # File app/controllers/multidimensional_data_controller.rb, line 38
def geojson
  geojson = params[:geojson].read
  @geojson = geojson
  render 'geojson'
end
    show() click to toggle source 
    # File app/controllers/multidimensional_data_controller.rb, line 8
def show
  @layer = Layer.find(params[:layer_id])
  start_time = Time.now
  csv_data = CSV.read(params[:csv_file].path)
  header = csv_data[0]
  body = csv_data[1..-1].map do |row|
    Hash[header.zip(row)]
  end
  lat = header.detect{|h| h and h.match 'latitude'}
  lon = header.detect{|h| h and h.match 'longitude'};
  #header = header[0..-1].select{|h| h and !h.match('gps')}
  unique = Hash.new({})
  header.each_with_index do |col, index|
    unique[col] = Hash.new(0)
    body.each {|item| unique[col][item[col]] += 1}
  end
  header = header.select{|col| unique[col].length < Math.sqrt(body.length)}
  header.push(lat).push(lon)
  @result = [header].push(body)

  points = body.map{|row| {:id => params[:layer_id], :lon => row[lon], :lat => row[lat]}}
  points_in_area = Area.contains_points_in_layer_json(params[:layer_id].to_i, points, @tolerance)

  @result_areas = {:points_in_area => points_in_area}
  end_time = Time.now
  elapsed_time = (end_time.to_f * 1000.0).to_i - (start_time.to_f * 1000.0).to_i

  render 'show'
end

def upload
  @layers = Layer.order("name")
end
